survey_name: AI-Powered Job Matching Platform User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered job matching platforms to evaluate their satisfaction, identify pain points, and understand desired improvements.

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered job matching platform have you used in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture platforms not listed. Consider limiting response to one platform if focused analysis is needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with 'Other' triggering a text input if selected.

script.question_text: Which AI-powered job matching platform have you used in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the job recommendations provided by the platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the job recommendations provided by the platform?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you in job recommendations? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to force prioritization. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with maximum 3 selections allowed.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you in job recommendations? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How often do you receive job recommendations that are irrelevant to your profile?
questions.client_notes: This is a key metric for platform effectiveness. Ensure question is clear and answers are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you receive job recommendations that are irrelevant to your profile?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in the platform's job recommendation algorithm?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with character limit.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in the platform's job recommendation algorithm?

questions.question_text: How transparent is the platform about how your data is used for job matching?
questions.client_notes: Data transparency is a growing concern. Use a balanced scale with clear anchors.

script.question_text: How transparent is the platform about how your data is used for job matching?

questions.question_text: Which of these features would most improve your experience with the platform? (Select up to 2)
answer_options: Better explanation of why jobs are recommended
Option to provide feedback on recommendations
questions.client_notes: Focus on actionable improvements. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with maximum 2 selections allowed.

script.question_text: Which of these features would most improve your experience with the platform? (Select up to 2)
answer_options: Better explanation of why jobs are recommended
Option to provide feedback on recommendations

questions.question_text: How likely are you to continue using this platform for your job search?
questions.client_notes: Key metric for customer retention. Use standard Likert scale for benchmarking.

script.question_text: How likely are you to continue using this platform for your job search?

questions.question_text: Have you ever received a job interview through this platform's recommendations?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to measure platform effectiveness. Consider adding 'Not sure' option if needed.

script.question_text: Have you ever received a job interview through this platform's recommendations?

questions.question_text: What would make you more likely to recommend this platform to others?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture advocacy drivers. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with character limit.

script.question_text: What would make you more likely to recommend this platform to others?
